item.title: A hard ass question Someone with high rep please help!
item.dc:creator: @Obpkv3 Obpkv3
item.description:
@Obpkv3 wrote:

public void loadpm(long name, int world) {
if (world != 0) world += 9;
outStream.createFrame(50);
outStream.writeQWord(name);
outStream.writeByte(world);
}

Theres, my code for the online and offline thing my clients fine i just found out it must be server sided because when i change the

public void loadpm(long name, int world) {
if (world != 0) world += 10; <--------- The number to ten it says there online and whens its 9 its says there offline
outStream.createFrame(50);
outStream.writeQWord(name);
outStream.writeByte(world);
}

So i dont know what the fuck to do -.- lol. maybe its my source? idk.
